changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'app Mobile et: Correction of a bug on the Mobile app and the Homebridge plugin
changelog.md.Suppression du bouton de duplication de: Remove mode duplication button (too many bugs)
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le calcul des co: Correction of a bug on the calculation of orphan orders
changelog.md.Ajout d'une commande indiquant le mode p: Addition of a command indicating the previous mode
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les templates de: Fixed bug on multistate V4 widget templates
changelog.md.Ajout de l'option pour dupliquer un mode: Add option to duplicate a mode
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug si les modes contena: Fixed a bug if the modes contained a special character
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la selection d'a: Correction of a bug on the selection of action condition on mode

index.md.Plugin permettant de gérer différents mo: Plugin to manage different modes of an apartment / house / room, but also atmospheres
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il vous: After downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it, there is no configuration at this level
index.md.La configuration des équipements mode es: The configuration of the mode equipment is accessible from the plugin menu then organization
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.les catégories de l'équipement (il peut: equipment categories (it can belong to several categories)
index.md.bouton permettant d'ajouter un nouveau m: button to add a new mode
index.md.En-dessous vous retrouvez la liste des m: Below you find the list of modes, by clicking on it you will be able to choose the actions to do when entering this mode and when exiting
index.md.Attention lors du renommage d'un mode il: Attention during the renaming of a mode it is absolutely necessary to review the scenarios / equipment which use the old name to pass them on the new
